about.name: Audrey Thornal
about.title: Game Designer & Developer
about.bio: CS & Game Design student at Northeastern University passionate about creating immersive interactive experiences. I combine technical skills with creative storytelling to build games and applications that engage and inspire.

projects.title: Wallace - Historical Interactive Fiction
projects.description: An immersive Gilded Age branching narrative game that explores historical themes through player choices and multiple storylines.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, responsive portfolio built with React showcasing my work in game design, programming, and visual design.

projects.title: Character Design Collection
projects.description: A series of original character designs exploring diverse personalities and visual styles for game development.
